possible_answers: number of carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen atoms
number of oxygen atoms joined to carbon atoms by double covalent bonds
arrangement of carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen atoms

questions.question: Thalidomide and L-dopa are examples of pharmaceutical drugs that occur as enantiomers, or molecules that ____.
possible_answers: are mirror images of one another
are mirror images of one another and have the same biological activity
questions.correct_answer: are mirror images of one another

questions.question: Why are hydrocarbons insoluble in water?
possible_answers: They exhibit considerable molecular complexity and diversity.
They are less dense than water.
The majority of their bonds are nonpolar covalent carbon-to-hydrogen linkages.
The majority of their bonds are polar covalent carbon-to-hydrogen linkages.
questions.correct_answer: The majority of their bonds are nonpolar covalent carbon-to-hydrogen linkages.

questions.question: The complexity and variety of organic molecules is due to ____.
possible_answers: the chemical versatility of carbon atoms
the diverse bonding patterns of nitrogen
the variety of rare elements in organic molecules
questions.correct_answer: the chemical versatility of carbon atoms
